About Kris Bolton

Kris is a Cyber Security masters student with a background in Computer Science (Software Engineering), his research focus is Critical National Infrastructure Defense and National Cyber Defense. He is currently writing a book "Practical Deep Learning Fundamentals.", designed to help fellow programmers self-learn Machine Learning.
